Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel for price but dodgy area”

Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel derby price paid cant complain basic 3 star hotel clean reception staff friendly helpful breakfast standard choice cereal yoghurt iced croissants bread ham cheese apples hotel 10 mins walk metro station easily accessible centre rome coliseum metro 2 3 stops stayed fine balcony air conditioning average size bathroom clean cleaned everyday tv tea coffee facilities negative hotel soon arrived walked metro stationit smelly absolutely covered rubbish lot couple pizza restaurants cheap eat wouldnt recommend speaks sort english typical italian suburb
